description: Prometheus数据源，通过SNMP Exporter采集交换机数据做监控

panels.description: 当前设备运行多长时间（中间无重启或关机）
panels.title: 设备启动（天）

targets.expr: memused{region=~"$region", role=~"$role", brand=~"$brand", instance=~"$device_ip"}/memtotal{region=~"$region", role=~"$role", brand=~"$brand", instance=~"$device_ip"} *100
skmemused{region=~"$region", role=~"$role", brand=~"$brand", instance=~"$device_ip"}/skmemtotal{region=~"$region", role=~"$role", brand=~"$brand", instance=~"$device_ip"} *100
mellanoxpwr{region=~"$region", role=~"$role", brand=~"$brand", instance=~"$device_ip", mellanoxlName="Power Supply",}/3

panels.description: 当前交换机接口流量排序前十
panels.title: 发送（当前-Top10）

panels.description: 当前交换机接口流量排序前十
panels.title: 发送（当前-Top10）

targets.expr: bgppeerstate{region=~"$region", role=~"$role", instance=~"$device_ip"} * on(instance) group_left(localas)  localas * on(instance) group_left(localident) localident * on(instance) group_left(sysName) sysName
lldpLocPortIdSubtype{region=~"$region", role=~"$role", instance=~"$device_ip"} * on(instance) group_left(sysName) sysName
hh3cdot1sMstiDesignedRoot{region=~"$region", role=~"$role", instance=~"$device_ip"} or hwMstpiDesignedRoot{region=~"$region", role=~"$role", instance=~"$device_ip"}

list.description: 区分华三设备，属于交换机还是AC或是防火墙
list.label: 角色
list.name: role

list.description: 列出交换机设备的IP信息
list.label: 设备IP
list.name: device_ip

list.description: 华三交换机设备接口列表
list.label: 接口
list.name: interface

title: 网络设备监控
